Holy Savagery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Shifter, any divine class, Channel Divinity class feature
Benefit: When you use a Channel Divinity power while you are bloodied, you gain a +1 bonus to melee attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 135.
